OOC: Did I say Ravage again I meant Rampage.

Rhesus detects a frequency, but doesn't know whose it is.  It seems 
bizaar. He grabbs some energon cubes as peace offerings and goes to 
see what it is.  He finds Transmutate crying.

Rhesus: What's wrong.

Transmutate: No friend.

Rhesus hands him the energon cubes and he eats them.

Transmutate: Friend.

Rhesus: Yes I'm a friend.

Rhesus guesses that Transmutates spark never fully went on line so he 
begins slowly probing his knowledge a little at a time to bring him 
out of it.

Rhesus: Do you have any other friends?

Mutate: Did.

Rhesus: Who?

Mutate: Sil-ver-bolt...Ram-page.

Rhesus: What happened to them?

Mutate: Don't know.

Rhesus: What factions were they in?

Mutate: Silver-bolt Maxi-mal...Rav-age Predi-con.

Rhesus: (jackpot) Did you have any more.

Mutate: They think I stupid.

Rhesus: Who said something like that?

Mutate: Rhi-nox, but he use different words.

Rhesus: (perfect now he's revising the words of others) Well I'm sure 
he was wrong. What faction are you in.

Mutate: Well, I was a Maximal Protoform, but I don't approve of 
fighting. In fact I jumped in the...hey....I'm not dumb anymore.

Rhesus: Nope. Just some gradually drilling into your spark. You need 
new legs. Let's go.
